onboarding.page_one.federation: {domain} is an "instance" of koyu.space. koyu.space is a network of independent servers joining up to make one larger social network. We call these servers instances.
onboarding.page_six.github: {domain} runs on koyu.space. koyu.space is a friendly {fork} of koyu.space. koyu.space is fully compatible with all koyu.space apps and instances. koyu.space is free open-source software. You can report bugs, request features, or contribute to the code on {github}.
